keyword: how many calories is in sausage
title: How Many Calories Are in a Sausage?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in sausage, including full nutrition breakdown per link, protein, fat, and variations for different types.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Sausage?
assumptions: One standard cooked pork sausage link (85 g), pan-fried, no added seasonings or fillers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (pork, beef, turkey), brand, size, cooking method, and additives. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked pork sausage link provides about 288 kcal and 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Italian sausage with herbs and spices

faqs.q: How many calories is in sausage per link?
faqs.a: About 288 kcal for one 85 g cooked pork sausage.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage?
faqs.a: Roughly 15.6 g protein per cooked pork sausage link.
Yes, about 25.6 g total fat, including 8.8 g saturated, per link.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in sausage?
faqs.a: Grilling or baking reduces fat compared to frying; frying adds ~40 kcal if oil is used.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in sausage?
faqs.a: Around 694 mg per 85 g link, varying by brand and seasoning.
